page.title: 12COMPUTER POETRY
page.content: {COMPUTER POEMS Quietly silently worm turning curving snail twirling Softly {Louise Stephenson 8 Slowly pushing Slowly turning Silently twisting Quietly rolling Caterpillar twisted Quietly { Amanda Miskell 8 Twisted mis-shapen Worm Bent snake bending silently Caterpillar growing. {Kevin Darbyshire 8 One member of class 4,{Michelle Macrae, found a twisted piece of root on the fields. Using the computer program{Wordplay}we made these poems. {HOLY SPIRIT R.C. PRIMARY SCHOOL {HECKMONDWIKE }
